Articles.Content:
My concept: To create a simple firing mechanism for a most likely solid rocket booster, to be fired from space, possibly with a modicum of accuracy.

I should have it done by 9:45(PST) tonight, I'm just wondering what people think of the concept!
Sounds cool! I'll wait until you're done.
Could be kinda cool depending on how you do it. I presume it will be an srb on a decoupler with both set to activate at the same time?
hm how are u gonna angle it without blowing it up?
